Articles.Content: Ever since I really mastered this game, I became stuck and bored with keeping myself busy. I tried downloading some mods, but in the end, mods are not my thing. Can anyone help?
I have gone through the same thing a few times now. Have you tried making ever larger, more elaborate designs?
Try making difficult challenges for yourself - things like impossibly tiny ships, etc. You probably have already done this.
Yup. This has happened to me a few times now. The only thing I can suggest is to try something you've never done before. Challenge yourself.

My long-term objectives include:

-Space shuttle development

-Mapping EVERYTHING

-Developing techniques for orbital and extraterrestrial construction without docking ports.

-R&D on innovative base designs and layouts.

I am in the same boat as you man, we just have to wait until Squad develops a purpose for doing all of this space exploration. Hope this helps!

I have gone through the same thing a few times now. Have you tried making ever larger, more elaborate designs?

or ever smaller. Try finding the smallest design that can complete the missions that used to take those 1000 ton launchers
A trip to Eve and back.
